raw_comment:
I notice that the majority of the people on the graph who think the world is getting better with each generation are between ages 15-24.
I wonder why people think it’s getting better? Being that COVID has come around which definitely took a toll on / killed a lot of people.
In my opinion this graph doesn’t really relate to my community. As the years went on the City of Poughkeepsie has gotten worse. There's no community center / YMCA that us teens can go to, of course there was violence back then but nowadays nobody can put down the guns. 
Are These New Generations For The Better or Worse?
ace_sentences: Some people think that the world is getting better with each generation.
Most of these people are between 15 years and 24 years old.
I wonder why people think that the world is getting better.
COVID took a toll on many people.
In my opinion, this graph does not relate to my community.
I live in the City of Poughkeepsie.
As the years went on, the City of Poughkeepsie got worse.
There is no community center in the City of Poughkeepsie.
There is no YMCA in the City of Poughkeepsie.
Some teens cannot go to a community center.
Some teens cannot go to a YMCA.
There was violence in the past.
The headline is: Are these new generations for the better or worse?
